word:
MR No. 1589 - Meetings in Massachusetts and Connecticut

                 (Diary Entries-August 5 to September 4, 1904.) 

     Washington, D.C., Friday, August 5, 1904: I cannot sleep after twelve o'clock. I am pressed as a cart beneath sheaves. I cannot sleep. My heart is pained for the condition of our churches and the great work of preparation that is to be done in the churches.
